main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted in Malden, Massachusetts on August 3, 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as a glob-like shape and orange in color., Witness claimed it had a speed in excess of a jet plane., The object flew with a long downward trend before reversing its direction upward., There was no sound associated with the object., Weather conditions were humid and dark at the time of the sighting.
